en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors RM 33,200 to Malaysia Navy Canoe & Kayaking Association 13th and 14th June 2009, The 8th Water Sports Carnival, Putrajaya 2009!
en.content:
REPORTED BY FusionExcel DIRECTOR ROSLEE M NOR.

The association on behalf of the Malaysia Navy would like to thank FusionExcel for the sponsorship. The event was held at the Water Sports Complex in Precinct 6, Putrajaya, Wilayah Persekutuan. 

This is the 1st of such sponsorship that we have receive yet so far this year. That is why it means a lot to the Navy teams. The Navy teams provide feedbacks that their recovery time after each competition is faster than usual. Normally it takes around 30 mins to recovery but that day it took them only 5 minutes to recover!

The Women Navy Team was even surprised by their performance because normally the difference between other teams during competition was very close but that day they manage to row with a marginal gap. They felt more energetic and feel highly charge emotionally before, during and after the competition.

The Men’s Team came in second and third place. 
 
Header The 8th Water Sports Carnival in Putrajaya.
The Navy Women Team won in the 
Dragon Boat Category.		 FusionExcel Directors Roslee M Nor and Mohd Fadzli giving the mock-up cheque to Navy Team Manager Lt Mo.
FusionExcel teams taking picture with FusionExcel ED Naelah and 
Razak visiting our booth.		 Explaining the use of Quantum Flask
Balance Demo done by FusionExcel Leader Firdaus 
to a Navy Team.		 FusionExcel Director Roslee M Nor.
From Left Navy Team Coach PW I PLM Mat Nazari Yusop, FE Director Mohd Fadzli and Navy Team Man. 09 FusionExcel Director Mohd Fadzli giving the Sponsored FusionExcel Pendant to National Athelete Noor Hamirul Husn.
Mens Navy Team A and B. Navy Women Team Preparing to Compete.
National Athelete Noor Hamirul Husna Abd Hamid 
representing the Navy Team competing in the Can.
